product_desc: VUcare is telehealth videoconferencing software that allows healthcare professionals (non-physician providers) to provide chronic disease self-management education, care and support to the 133 million chronic disease patients who are currently underserved in United States. It is not only a real-time communication tool but it also has a built-in HIPAA-compliant patient health information database management system that allows secondary providers to forward patients' information to their primary care providers for clinical follow up and review.
high_concept: Ultimate Telehealth Solution for Non-physician Providers
name: VUcare
